s_synopsis: A crabby witch casts a wicked spell and Crystal the Pony's friends are prisoners! Crystal gallops through flowery fields, dark forests and spooky caves in search of the magic crystals that will free her pony pals! Choose Crystal's colors and watch her use horse sense to solve puzzles and outsmart tricky elves. Find surprises and excitement everywhere in forest friends, glimmering crystals, talking trees and a scrumptious gingerbread house! Collect lucky horseshoes to open the gates, walk on clouds and create a rainbow bridge home to Crystal's castle. Seven levels of adventurous play for hours of fun!
